title: The One In My Heart
description: When Evangeline Canterbury meets the gorgeous, intriguing doctor next door, all she wants from him is a bit of distraction, to help her get over a few rough days.Her one-night stand, however, has other plans: He needs an accomplished and presentable girlfriend to bring before his parentsâ€”and for six months of her time, he is willing and prepared to spend an obscene amount of money.Nothing but trouble can come of such an arrangement. But can Eva stop herself? Or will she fall headlong in love with a man who will leave her when their contract expires with a smile, a check, and hardly a backward glance?
author: Sherry Thomas
